Package coupons.CouponsSystemWeb.exceptions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomExceptionHandler
    Handles exceptions in system
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CouponsSystemException
    Main exception in Coupon System, other exceptions extend this exception
    InvalidAmountException
    Exception used when trying to create a coupon with non positive amount
    InvalidDateException
    Exception used when trying to create of purchase a coupon with a passed end date
    InvalidIdException
    Exception used when trying to update data with an Id in path different from object Id
    InvalidLoginException
    Exception used when login fails
    OutofStockException
    Exception used when trying to purchase a coupon out of stock (amount is 0)
    UnauthorizedException
    Exception used when user is not authorized for operation
    UniqueValueException
    Exception used when trying to add a value that should be unique in system
    ValueNotFoundException
    Exception used when trying to fetch data that was not found in system
